objects.text:
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Electronic Viewfinder (EVF)
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile XF lens mount system compatible with Fujinon's premium lens lineup
• Electronic viewfinder (EVF) for accurate composition and exposure preview
• Multiple manual control dials for quick access to essential settings
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Advanced autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Durable black metal construction with ergonomic grip
• Multiple creative filters and film simulation modes
• Tiltable LCD screen for flexible shooting angles

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional layout showcasing a mirrorless camera with modern appeal and retro styling. The primary focus is a high-resolution product image placed on the upper right quadrant layered over deep blue and navy background tiles with grid and shape elements for a sleek framework. The top left features a large bold white headline (`heading`) followed by the model name (`product_name`) below it in a minimal font. A small yellow subheading (`tagline`) sits underneath, highlighting a time-bound offer. The mid-left includes feature highlights (`description`), while the bottom displays pricing in large type (`price`). The bottom-right section emphasizes a purchase prompt with a rectangular button (`cta_button`) and bold "Shop Now" label (`cta`), paired with an urgency notice (`offer_text`) in strong dark blue text.  
   
**Color Palette**:  
- Deep Navy Blue (#1A2844)  
- Steel Blue (#233454)  
- Royal Blue (#2D4066)  
- Gold Yellow (#FFB800)  
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera predominantly in matte black (#1C1C1C), with accents of glossy black (#2E2E2E) and white text (#FFFFFF) for branding and dials. The lens highlights silvery metallic rings (#A6A6A6) and subtle copper-orange details (#FF7F27) that provide visual contrast. The lens coating reflects hints of greenish-yellow (#B5C103) and teal (#54BAB9), lending a dynamic touch. The blended blacks create depth and texture, while white elements highlight controls and logos, enhancing legibility. For an advertisement banner, a color palette featuring Black (#1C1C1C), White (#FFFFFF), Silver (#A6A6A6), Orange (#FF7F27), and Teal (#54BAB9) would maintain brand integrity and visual impact.
